Maurice Ravel

Margot la Rouge (Frederick Delius)

1902 · Marnat 37 (A. 3)

Total duration: 5' 30"

  • 1. Prelude
  • 2. Duet

Ravel produced a vocal score for Frederick Delius’s opera Margot la Rouge. From this, the prelude (bars 1–65) and the duet (bars 642–666 and 676–693, omitting the vocal line) can be treated as pieces for solo piano.

Recommended editions

  • The Delius Trust/Boosey & Hawkes · Frederick Delius / Scenes from the operas as arranged for the piano by Maurice Ravel and Florent Schmitt · ed. Robert Threlfall

1. Prelude

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Duet

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3
